room_title: Escape room "Kidnapped" by Escape Port Charlotte in Fort Myers
review: My son had a blast with his friends today for his birthday Kidnapped experience. They didn't get out but still had fun and made some great memories!

room_title: Escape room "Kidnapped" by Escape Port Charlotte in Fort Myers
review: First time doing something like this. We did Kidnapped and although we did not get out in time, we had a blast! Very challenging!

room_title: Escape room "Kidnapped" by Escape Port Charlotte in Fort Myers
review: This was our first attempt at an escape room and we loved it. The Kidnapping was challenging and fun. We escaped with only 2:25 left and the excitement towards the end was exhilarating. We can't wait for the next trip.
